title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Mobile Phone Utilization Strategies for Adult Learner-Customized Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and workplace application experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can successfully apply strategies to solve work-related mathematical problems in real-time using mobile phones with over 80% success
Learners can produce three or more math concept explanation contents using mobile applications according to intentional/improvisational teaching methods
Learners can achieve over 70% participation in math problem-solving discussions with peer learners through the use of digital collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
